quote: Agree on the easy stuff at the beginning to set the tone for a nice negotiation.
why_clipworthy: This advice is practical and can be immediately implemented by agents to improve negotiation outcomes.
suggested_hook: Want to close deals more smoothly? Start by agreeing on the easy stuff.

quote: Sometimes putting decision makers in a room together can lead to a successful outcome.
why_clipworthy: This approach challenges the conventional wisdom of keeping parties separate during negotiations.
suggested_hook: Could bringing buyers and sellers together actually help close deals faster?
